post.html:
It's time to add a dependency, so in your Xcode project, right-click in your project's name and select "Add packages". We will be using Alamofire. Use the URL https://github.com/Alamofire/Alamofire.git within Xcode to install it.

Now we are ready to use the framework by importing it import Alamofire.
post.title: Adding Alamofire Dependency
